entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
